SEARCH
Package com.app.repository

Interface StatisticRepository

All Superinterfaces:
CrudRepository<Statistic,Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
StatisticRepositoryImpl
public interface StatisticRepository extends CrudRepository<Statistic,Long>
Repository interface for managing Statistic entities. This interface provides methods to perform CRUD operations and retrieve statistics related to players.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Statistic>
    deleteByPlayerId(Long playerId)
    Deletes all statistics associated with a specific player ID.
    List<Statistic>
    findByPlayerId(Long playerId)
    Finds all statistics associated with a specific player ID.

    Methods inherited from interface com.app.repository.impl.generic.CrudRepository

    delete, findAll, findAllById, findById, findLast, save, saveAll

  • Method Details

    • findByPlayerId

      List<Statistic> findByPlayerId(Long playerId)
      Finds all statistics associated with a specific player ID.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player for whom to find statistics
      Returns:
      a list of Statistic objects associated with the specified player ID

    • deleteByPlayerId

      List<Statistic> deleteByPlayerId(Long playerId)
      Deletes all statistics associated with a specific player ID.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player for whom to delete statistics
      Returns:
      a list of Statistic objects that were deleted, associated with the specified player ID
